content:
I'm working on a project that requires the user information for multiple Twitter accounts. I have a list of user IDs and I need to retrieve their profiles. Can you help me with this?
Begin!
Understood. I'll work to retrieve the user profiles based on the list of user IDs you have. Please provide me the list of Twitter user IDs.

function.arguments: {"return_type":"give_up_and_restart","final_answer":"You need to provide the Twitter user IDs so I can retrieve their profiles for you."}
function.name: Finish
